title: bavayE sadharam
sahitya:
bhAvayE sAdaram shrI dharma shAstAram bhAsurAkAram sadA shabarIshvaram

anupallavi

 pIvara madabhara mahiSI vidAraNam pInakaruNam shrtAmaya vAraNam

caraNam

 sAdhaka lOka sugamam ghanashyAmam sAdhu manOramam suSamAjita kAmam 
bhUda rAgAram vIram sadAdhAram bhUtanAtham vana tulasIdala hAram
